alert.note: Alert for Adams; Billings; Bowman; Divide; Dunn; Golden Valley; Hettinger; McKenzie; Slope; Stark; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 07 at 2:09PM CDT until September 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR WESTERN NORTH DAKOTA THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING... .Critical fire weather conditions are expected over western North Dakota this afternoon and evening. Winds will be southerly up to 15 mph and gusting up to 25 mph, with a wind shift to southwesterly late this afternoon. Minimum relative humidity will be in the teens, dropping as low as 18 percent in the far southwest. Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly in dry fuels and become difficult to control or suppress. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN NORTH DAKOTA... * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * AFFECTED AREA...Western North Dakota. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and become difficult to control or suppress.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Billings; Bowman; Divide; Dunn; Golden Valley; Hettinger; McKenzie; Slope; Stark; Williams
